org.rapidcontext.app.plugin

Class PluginUpgradeStorage

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.rapidcontext.core.storage.StorableObject
      • org.rapidcontext.core.storage.Storage
        • org.rapidcontext.core.storage.WrappedStorage
          • org.rapidcontext.app.plugin.PluginUpgradeStorage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable

    public class PluginUpgradeStorage
extends WrappedStorage
    A storage wrapper for plug-ins. This class performs a number of optional and dynamic transformations to the data loaded from a plug-in storage. This enables newer version of the platform to load data from old plug-ins (with some caveats).
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Per Cederberg

    • Method Detail

      • load

        public java.lang.Object load(Path path)
        Loads an object from the specified location. The path may locate either an index or a specific object. In case of an index, the data returned is an index dictionary listing of all objects in it.
        Overrides:
        load in class WrappedStorage
        Parameters:
        path - the storage location
        Returns:
        the data read, or null if not found
